title: choose your battlefield map
text:
Let's set up your battlefield! Each Judgement map has a number of scenarios for you to map out and engage with.

Start by determining whether you will be playing in Skirmish Mode (3v3 smaller mat) or Battle Mode (5v5 larger mat).

Simply choose your map, or randomly select one by rolling a D6. Battlefield Maps can be found in the Battlefield Maps supplement (pg.88) or by visiting our website at: www.creaturecaster.com
